subtitle: This recipe is easy enough for a weekday meal but is also a treat for weekends.

method.text: In a small pan, combine the honey, soy sauce, teriyaki marinade, mustard, five spice, garlic, if using and seasoning. Simmer together gently for 2-3 min until honey has melted and all ingredients are well mixed.
Arrange the bacon chops on a grill pan. Brush liberally with the glaze. Grill for 8 min. Turn over, brush again with the glaze and cook for a further 8-10 min until cooked through.

title: Five-spiced glazed bacon
